flawed_nl_solution:
She has 240 minutes to write because 4 x 60 = <<4*60=240>>240
She will write 24000 words because 240 x 10 = <<240*10=24000>>24000
She will earn $2400 for the words because 24000 x 0.1 = <<24000*0.1=2400>>2400
She will earn $180 from the articles because 3 x 60 = <<3*60=180>>180
She will earn $2580 in total because 2400 + 180 = <<2400+180=2580>>2580
She will average $645 an hour because 2580 / 4 = <<2580/4=645>>645
#### 645

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2400, not 24000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
